titles.title: Providing for the printing of a revised edition of the Rules and Manual of the House of Representatives for the One Hundred Ninth Congress.
Providing for the printing of a revised edition of the Rules and Manual of the House of Representatives for the One Hundred Ninth Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Requires the printing as a House document of a revised edition of the Rules and Manual of the House of Representatives for the 109th Congress.
